author: Coingape Staff
title: Is Solana Rally on the Horizon with US ETF Boost? - 'CoinGape' News Summary (India) | BEAMSTART
text:
Quick Summary: Solana (SOL) price, one of 2024’s top-performing cryptocurrencies, has surged over 100%, showcasing bullish momentum on long-term charts.
Market experts believe the approval, likely under President-elect Donald Trump’s incoming administration, will catalyze retail participation.
The anticipated approval of a Solana-focused Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF) in the United States could significantly boost the demand for altcoin.
